SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AttachEvent
SimulationEvent that signals simulation owner to attach a DebugShell instance.
Bus
Represents a communication bus for a simulation.
Bus.ByteSelect
Byte select modes.
BusInterface
Implements an interface a Processor instance can use to read and write from the bus it's mounted on.
CycleEvent
SimulationEvent that represents a simulation cycle.
DebugEvent
SimulationEvent that signals a general event (for debugging purposes) on a simulation component.
DebugShell
Handles the shell shown in debug mode.
DebugShell.HelpPage
Enum to index help pages.
Decoder
Decodes rv32i instructions into microop sequences through a static Decoder.decode(microsim.simulation.component.processor.Processor, int) method, using the Trie class to index.
Elf
Reads an ELF header and its program headers, used to load EPROM data for simulation.
ElfHeader
Reads and represents an ELF header.
FrameEvent
SimulationEvent that signals a VideoDevice has finished rendering to frame buffer
IoDevice
Implements a device that exposes ports on the bus from a certain address.
JComponentKeyboardSource
Implements a keyboard source by listening to keyboard events on a JComponent.
KeyboardDevice
Implements a keyboard devices that mantains a character queue and returns them via a status and a data port.
KeyboardSource
Implements an input source that can be attached to a KeyboardDevice to send key events (through the KeyboardDevice.keyQueue method.
Main
Contains program entry point.
MemorySpace
Implements a memory space as a (to outside users) contiguous array of byte locations.
MicroOp
Implements a micro operation (microop) the Processor can execute.
MicroOp.OpType
Enum of microop types.
Processor
A processor implementing the RISC-V rv32i ISA.
ProgramHeader
Reads and represents an ELF program header.
Simulation
Represents a simulation instance.
SimulationComponent
A component simulated within the Simulation class.
SimulationEvent
Represents an event raised by a SimulationComponent object.
SimulationListener
Interface for listeners of SimulationEvent events.
ThreadedIoDevice
Implements a device that should be simulated on a thread alongside the main simulation loop.
Trie
Defines a trie data structure used to query microop sequences from instruction encodings.
TSLine
Models a 3-state logic line.
VideoDevice
Implements a video device that renders a frame buffer by reading from VRAM.
VideoPanel
Extends JPanel to display frame buffers rendered by VideoDevice components.
VideoRenderer
Implements a rendering component for the VideoDevice device, responsible of keeping a frame buffer and rendering to it.
VideoWindow
Handles JFrame for windowing and VideoPanel for frame buffer display.
